what: Convert session info to a Lockfile
title: Convert session info to a Lockfile
text: Software users researchers encouraged provide information R session order facilitate reproducibility help debugging. sessioninfo R package provides convenient way gather display information. However, can tedious locally recreate R environment another user based output sessioninfo::session_info() output. sessioninfo2renv package provides function convert output sessioninfo::session_info() lockfile (renv.lock) can used renv R package recreate R environment.
